message.body: hi
time to beat this in 5 minutes
definitely
free boss
definitely didn't take me any time at all

gl gl

oh hey stunnedbyte
ive seen your pit hack videos, really cool stuff

Ya, somethings are way harder than it looks, example, the despawn in the first room
how does that even work? do you use the corner to boost mario to the right
i didnt know that moved the camera
Yes, it moves mario, so it also moves camera, but it also relies on the subpixel
Yes, thats hard to line up because the camera also has the faster movement
And the framerule might screw you
18 pixels
In the last g
Lol i sent by accident
In the first frame, the camera has to be 1 pixel do the left
In the last frame, it has to be 1 pixel to the right
oh btw what do you stun at the end of the blue room
in one of the previews
You need it to "skip" the entire tile
there is no reasonable way that the spawn window is not 16px
you carry something through the pipe, i cant tell what it is
but 0F + 17 is 20 so that skips 10
hex
except the 17 because i'm stupid
shut up
Lmao
let me be stupid in peace
I think 18 would be just the displacement then
also i think the game could be a bit quieter
"0F + 17 is 20" just say you're using base 22, everything is fine.
In the blue room, i stunned unused sprite F0 which is spawned by the sparky, but i also have to do some tweaker corruption, so it becomes a Powerup
enter?
i don't think this game has another pause button
yeah fair
yeah that's what i meant by hex
obv
this boss needs a 20% chance of shooting 20% more bullets.
The pattern structure should be homing
Are thrse platforms ledges?
blue bullets should be homing, red ones explode into pieces, green ones grow with distance and yellow ones loop around the screen.
time to upset dacin
i like how he keeps attacking even though you died 10 years ago
ya I think it's super lame that the game shows all attacks in advance.
Maybe you should hide under the platform, idk
Jump under it
The bullets should have different hitboxes by color, so you get screwed like Ringo's last spell
your bullets should curve with the background.
i.e. if you're on the right, you always hit the platform.
(and background spin direction should be random)
switch based on your position, so it always fucks with you.
the boss has been here for so long, why wouldn't it set up the background in its favor?
Should be random patterns that builds walls of bullets all the time like the entirety of touhou 6
Nice strat, since the pattern is homing, jump into thr boss so it shoots itself
also, why isn't the boss dodging your bullets? go do some touhou 3.

imagine having finite ammunition.

unless you found the "slightly larger magazine".
if he were sitting down hed have a smaller hitbox, is he stupid?
now imagine how distracted the boss must be.
no he's too distracted to realize that he's stupid.
of course you can
